EmailTemplate.description: Alerting partners their $100 is in the mail
EmailTemplate.name: 18-02 5th Deal Bonus Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on your latest deal! You've earned another BlueWave Bonus.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
YOU'RE TRUE BLUE!
Congratulations on closing your 5th deal with BlueWave Solar financing!
To celebrate, we are sending you a BlueWave Bonus of $100!
Please reply to this email with your shipping address to use for safe delivery.
We hope you use this gift for whatever you love best!
What's Next? At deal #10, the prizes get serious. In addition to another $100 in BlueWave Bonus earnings, you have earned a $500 TEAM GIFT to be cashed at a restaurant of your choice.
Thanks for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
General Partner Support 888-817-2703 PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com Partner Support is available 8AM - 8PM EST
